channel.title: Gregor Hohl on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Gregor Hohl on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Building a site with hugo
item.description: I thought the best way to get this blog started would be to let you know how it was created. My goal for this website was to have an extended CV that I could share quickly and to have a place on the web to share my experiences. My fist thought was wordpress. While I have no experience using wordpress I know that it is very widely used and I like that it provides a cheap open-source way to the web.

item.title: Cv
item.description: -- Education Physics Msc. 2020-present ETH Zurich, Switzerland Physics Bsc. 2016-2020 ETH Zurich, Switzerland Semester project at Institute of Micro- and Nanosystems: Improvement of convergence and computational efficiency of self-consistent charge calculations in carbon nanotube FETs Gymnasium 2007-2015 Europagymnasium, Klagenfurt Matura: 1.0 Projects Data Science/Machine learning projects 2018-present (Python/sklearn/Keras/Tensorflow/pytorch) Over the course of my studies I attended machine learning and data science courses that required project work.
